com.bookworm.controllers

Class ReviewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bookworm.controllers.ReviewController

  • @RestController
 @Scope(value="singleton")
 @RequestMapping(value="books/{bookId}/reviews")
public class ReviewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles all basic review API endpoints GET and POST.
    Since:
    1.7

      • getReviewsForBook

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getReviewsForBook(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                               long bookId)
        Fetch all reviews for the given book by book id.
        Parameters:
        bookId - book's id.
        Returns:
        array of reviews as json.

      • saveReview

        @Transactional
 @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Review> saveReview(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                             long bookId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @Validated @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                             ReviewData rd)
        Save one review to the database for the given book.
        Parameters:
        bookId - book's id.
        rd - review data (text and stars).
        Returns:
        saved review.
